import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import word from './Words.js' import "./boardStyle.css" export default function Board() { const [getLetters, setLetters] = useState([]) const [getCurrentLetters, setCurrentLetters] = useState([]); const [getClassNames, setClassNames] = useState([]); const [getWord, setWord] = useState(""); const [getStatus, setStatus] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { setWord(word); }, []); return (
{getLetters[0]}
{getLetters[1]}
{getLetters[2]}
{getLetters[3]}
{getLetters[4]}
{getLetters[5]}
{getLetters[6]}
{getLetters[7]}
{getLetters[8]}
{getLetters[9]}
{getLetters[10]}
{getLetters[11]}
{getLetters[12]}
{getLetters[13]}

{getLetters[15]}
{getLetters[16]}
{getLetters[17]}
{getLetters[18]}
{getLetters[19]}
{getLetters[20]}
{getLetters[21]}
{getLetters[22]}
{getLetters[23]}
{getLetters[24]}

{getWord}

{getStatus}

) }
